QuestData.Title: What the Bony Xuk?
QuestData.Description: Good to see your bones are still intact, $n. Xuk's too.$b$bWhen you set off into the heart of the canyon, Xuk came to offer my services. Xuk not letting you take all of the skulls!$b$bXuk will share with you powerful spirit magics my clan has passed down for many generations. While Xuk make preparations, you must gather the reagents.$b$bFirst, we'll need crystals from husks of goren corpses. You can find their bodies in the canyon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Goren Crystals from Longtooth Gorgers.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... we don't need their bones, but we do need their crystals.
